alert.note: Alert for Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 4:32PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yamhill and southwestern Tillamook Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 431 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cloverdale, or near Pacific City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pacific City, Neskowin, Cloverdale, Grand Ronde Indian Reservation, Blaine, Hebo and Beaver. In Oregon this includes U.S. Highway 101 between mile markers 80 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast
